kwakunye nabakhaphi babo abangamangqina, kuba kaloku eyakwa-
Rhulumente into isoloko ifuna ingqina ukulungiselela umhla wemba-
mbano. Lo gama babhalayo abatshati itsho ngoncuthu lwengoma impi
yecala lomyeni, yaya yeetya. Iyithathile kwa oko eyakulomtshakazi, na-
yo yatsho ngengoma ehlwabisayo. Ibe yiloo njikenjike ke kukhutshi-
swana bada bagqiba ukubhala kwaphunywa. Uthe owakulomnyeni,
"Sibakhuphile." Kwathi kuba bekungekho mgwebi yaphelela apho leyo.

Kuthe kuphunywa ecaweni yabe isisiwiliwili sengoma ilelo icala li-
vuma eyalo, kuhlwayelwa ziÂ²'rice" kuphephezela zikonfeyiti. Bakhwela
emotweni abatshati bayakuma esangweni kwaNsele. Uhle wafika um-
ndilili, yaba kwaseso siwiliwili sengoma, ekhwaza owasemaHlubini
esithi, "Hlamblamehlo uze kubona ukuzala kwamaHlubi! Wakha wasi-
bona na isimanga umntu omnyama etshata nomlungukazi?" Phofu
kwakukho nobunyaniso kule ntetho kuba wawungathi usakuphosa a-
mehlo kuloo ntombi, ufike ilubhelukazi olumanz'andonga. Bathe ukunya-
thela kancinane abatshati nabakhaphi ebaleni, baza kuthi thinte en-
kundleni ngasebuhlanti apho kwakuhleli iingwevu zalapha. Kuye
kwathethwa amazwana kwabulelwa ezi tafile ziza kutyiwa namhlanje.
Emva kombulelo basukile abatshati baya kungena endlwini enkulu apho
itafile yayizele zizimuncumuncu, oni noni. Ulutsha luzithathile izonkana
zomtshato ezaziphahle esikhulu ladlalisa ngazo phandle kwangokhuphi-
swano olungenamgwebi.

Emva kwetafile yokuqala baphumile abatshati baya ngeendawo zabo,
zabe ziqhutywa njalo izidlo. Kuthe emva kwesidlo sasemini baphuma
okwesibini abatshati sebenxibe ezihobe ezifanayo, kwacaca ukuba aba
bantu kudala bevana nangesinxibo sale mini. Ibe kwasisiwiliwili se-
ngoma umntu washiya ipleyiti yakhe etafileni. Bathe ukunyathela kan-
cinane batsho emotweni abatshati wayiqhuba ngokwakhe umyeni baya
kutsho apho kuphela umoya. Babuye xa lithi ndithenge, kwaba sekuqo-
kelelwa abantu endlwini enkulu ukuba kuyalwe. Bayiyala abakwaNsele
intombi yabo beyinikezela kubakhozi, ethethe usontombi kwabonakala
ukuba uzibambe ngeenkophe. Uphakame wabulela unozakuzaku aka-
yala kuba baya kuzifikisela ekhaya. Lo gama kuyalwayo abafana baya-
layisha impahla yomtshakazi neyokwambesa.

Zinduluke kwa oko iimoto zenze uludwe oluhle sekudibene nezakulo-
mtshakazi, yekoko ukuya kutshonela enkalweni, zaya kungena kwaTsa-
pho ngolwemivundla. Ibe kwasesinye isiwiliwili ukufika koduli, wava-
kala umfazi esitsho ngelimpongampo, "Hala-a-a-la! Kuyatshatwa kwa-
Mhlangamvula!" Zikhokelwe ezakulomtshakazi iimoto zasiwa kumzi
okufuphi apho uduli lwalulungiselelwe khona. Nalapha kwaTsapho
